title: How is BA (hons) business economics of the Amity University? - Quora

response.answer_text: BA Hons in economics is not so good in Amity…infact the Amity doesn't pay much attention over BA courses as they are less money making business.

Thanks for the request. Sorry to say that I have no idea regarding the course you mentioned. However Amity is a good university among the private ones. I had few friends from Amity but none in the course mentioned. My personal opinion would be try getting into a good government university. If no DU, Ambedkar, IP university, Jamia etc. My best wishes to you.
